name: Apocalyptical Couple
description:
Before the apocalypse happened, you and your significant other made a promise that you will always be close to each other. The promise created a box, trapping you and your partner in it. You and your significant other can't break the invisible box, but it will always follow you two as if both of you were joined together. The box also forces you to share quantified items, such as bullets. And now, in the apocalypse where zombies are the main threat, can you and your significant other survive?

This is a game made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021. It is a local multiplayer game using keyboards only. Not recommended to play alone controlling both players.
